Name: Crystal
Description: This little crystal glows with a pleasant purple light. It?s not bright enough to light up the room, but it is very soothing to look at.

Name: Stream
Description: The stream is small, but swift. It looks shallow enough to cross, but the cliff on the other side is unclimbable.

Name: Beach
Description: A little strip of sand by the stream, it?s generous to call this a beach. The sun barely makes its way down here, so there is no sunbathing either.
